data.text: @TODAYshow Look at this! Tom Brady is gay for his son!
@TODAYshow It's probably fine but the way they portray him in this picture looks kind of creepy

@TODAYshow I kiss my four daughters, (ages: 14, 17, 22, & 24) on the lips. People need to get their heads out of the gutter. Its a family thing...some families are more affectionate than others. People need to mind their own business.
@TODAYshow He is fine. He lives his kids!
@TODAYshow Just stop
@tweetford87 @TODAYshow Nope not weird
@TODAYshow Granted I am definitely not a fan of his by any means but he seems to be a loving dad.

@TODAYshow German Baptist men greet one another with a short kiss on the lips. It was a way to introduce new germs, virus, what have you. It builds immune systems. Tom Brady enjoys his children. You are never too old to kiss, hug, or say, " I love you."   There was no tongue. Leave it!!
@TODAYshow Um no that looks creepy
@TODAYshow The child is kissing dad, dad isn’t making a move on his son! Cripes, people! @TODAYshow , focus on the pediphilia rampant in society and put the focus there.
@TODAYshow Oh stop!
@TODAYshow Really?
@TODAYshow People need to get a life

@haroldhankson @TODAYshow I am never one to "blindly comment", so yes I have seen the video. Also, I just showed my boyfriend the video, the father of our 2 boys. He does not kiss our boys on the mouth (because it's up to each child, imo) and found nothing wrong with it either. My 13 y/o didn't as well.
@T_Mrozinski @TODAYshow Did you watch the video?  Or are you blindly commenting?
@haroldhankson @TODAYshow I'm his Mom. What is so weird about that? It's called LOVE. If your mind makes it go any further than that then that's your problem and it makes you weird.
@TODAYshow Kissed my children on the lips and still do as grown men. Go Tommy boy. More fathers needed like you.

@TODAYshow Good Lord! Our kids are grown and we still kiss them on the mouth. It's a peck. It's not like we're making out! Blah- shuddering. At least he's a present dad! Lighten up people! #kissyourbabies
@TODAYshow What is wrong with people? Can’t a man show live to his son? You people are sick 😖

@tweetford87 @TODAYshow Come on it wasn't seven minutes! It was perfectly innocent. More fathers should show that much love for their sons and maybe more boys wouldn't grow up to be so abusive to their wives and children.
@TODAYshow What's the big deal?? It's just love.
@TODAYshow y'all some weirdos
@TODAYshow Stupid news!
@TODAYshow Eww.

@TODAYshow I hug&kiss all my children, just not on the backside or the lips. But if he& others are doing that I'm not going to judge them for it. Maybe that's the way they convey their love for each other as Father&Son. Mother's&Son's have been criticized for it also Father's&Daughters okay
@TODAYshow This is really a topic of conversation? With everything going on in the World today, please don't be distracted by senseless topics and media.
@TODAYshow  https://t.co/aptMbYuIzA
@TODAYshow Wow!! today you are the ones taking it too far!!

@TODAYshow That kiss is not weird at all. that is a father showing affecting to his child. That is how we all learn to love and show others is through how we experience our first loves.... our parents. The prob is there is too little affection everywhere else.
@TByse @TODAYshow You can tell the ones who never had a father that loved them so sad
@marybsjams @TODAYshow I just said that
@TODAYshow They are reaching! My house is not for you to understand
@TODAYshow Really? How dare you people who has dirty mind.
@TODAYshow  https://t.co/bFyYjwV99y
@TODAYshow Great let's pick on Tom Brady just before his big game. Bad Manners
@TODAYshow It’s NOT too far
@TODAYshow I think you needed more kisses from your parents as a child .
@TODAYshow For the love of everything, find something relevant to report about. There’s no lack of it.
@TODAYshow Bid deal! Nobody says anything about the sports players that are absentee fathers... SMDH
@TODAYshow This is absurd! WTF is wrong with person that posted this? #unfollowTODAYshow
@TODAYshow Give me a break! If you want to kiss your children on the lips that’s your business. I kissed my parents on the lips until the day they died!
@TODAYshow Only white ppl do this pedophile ass shit!!!!! Men should NOT kiss boys!!!!
@TODAYshow It is disgusting your show perpetuates this garbage. Sad just sad
@TODAYshow Poeople give this stuff a rest, who cares.
@TODAYshow Parents kiss their children on the lips. No big deal.
@TODAYshow So what?? A non story. And really bad for the boy to read or see. And I don’t even like Tom Brady! But come on now.

@TODAYshow For some families this is ok, others not.  To each his own. What's shocking to me is the comments I see about people making this about him being friendly with Trump? I don't see the connection.
@TODAYshow woo https://t.co/1TzwD9tQrb
@TODAYshow oh come on people get over it. It isn't a sexual perverted kiss. Geez. Puck everything people say apart. Look in your mirrors
@TODAYshow Love love love. We are only love. Embrace the connection. Love feels like a kiss from son.
@TODAYshow What the.............?
@TODAYshow Get over it People
@T_Mrozinski @TODAYshow Weird weird weird
@R_R_R_Jr Ok I watched it again. Yeah that grown man is inappropriate. Not by the kiss but with the conditioning that came with the kiss.
@R_R_R_Jr Let me go watch it again. That was my first instinct gotta get a second opinion
@R_R_R_Jr I wasn’t even uncomfortable with the second kiss till the boy wiped his mouth and that man massaging him said that creepy shit.
@truemira And that masseur saying everything has a price. I mean the first kiss was fine. Its a peck, but that second one.....I mean I was creeped out. Then the kid wiping his mouth.

@truemira Now see your sentiments echo mine. Its clear that for them its how they roll because there are pictures of Brady kissing his dad on the mouth so ok fine. But yes its the request for affection to get permission for something that is bothersome

@R_R_R_Jr I am off put by the other adult on the room reinforcing that behavior verbally and I noted the son wiping his mouth afterwards which for me signifies he is uncomfortable with having done it. It feels comfortable

@R_R_R_Jr Ok I can understand why ppl see that and become uncomfortable. However, that’s how their family functions. I disagree with teaching your kids to trade with any adults with physical forms of affection for rewards.
@TODAYshow People should mind their own business. Not everything is sexual except to perverts.
@TODAYshow Why does people take an innocent father-son moment and turn it into something nasty? Get a life people!

@LeaningKeith @TweetedByJeanne @TODAYshow My son is 18 and the I think the last time was around 8 that I hugged and kissed him last, now we just hug and he’s like one of my best friends. This is not for us to debate is what I’m getting around to. Bit weird.

@TODAYshow Father asks son for a proper kiss... Son responds with a kiss on the lips . Son is in control of the kiss (I don’t see Tom holding his son to his lips)..a beautiful moment... .as a society we are asked to accept gay marriage .. why is this unacceptable...love how you want to Tom
@LeaningKeith @TweetedByJeanne @TODAYshow Says you. And you are who exactly?
@TODAYshow Its creepy😐
@TODAYshow Absolutely NOTHING wrong here people. Move on. Keep your minds in the positive and out of the gutter.

@TODAYshow So what? My kids boys and girls, full grown adults still kissed their Daddy and Grndpa  that way till both of died  Its your parents.  If he feels comfortable so be it. Leave it up to the child to make decision.  They know what they are comfortable with.
@TODAYshow Grow up! It’s beautiful!
@TODAYshow Oh for petes sake...leave them alone!
@TODAYshow Ewww
@TODAYshow A tad weird
@lbell424 @TODAYshow So true

@TODAYshow Find something better to talk about. I’m not a die hard fan but he’s a great dad and so many parents whose kids were sick and died parents who serve in our military they’d give anything to kiss their kids on the lips forehead etc everyday
@TODAYshow That’s his damn son. Father Love. People need to mind their business.
@JeffParthum @TODAYshow Not to mention National Enquirer, et al.
@TODAYshow I’m the parent of a college age child and I still kiss both of my parents and my own child. And I am the LAST person who would defend Tom Brady if I thought he was wrong.
@truemira Take a look when you can and let me know your thoughts on that whole situation
@TODAYshow I feel sorry for those who do not have that kind of relationship with their parents 😘
@TODAYshow Nothing else to report about? World going a little slow lately?
@TODAYshow If you think this is inappropriate, it's you who thought that, it's your mind that's dirty and filthy.
@TODAYshow Seriously? Fathers who truly adore and nurture their kids are a priceless treasure.
@TODAYshow I kiss my children and grandchildren on the lips! What in the world is wrong with that? OMG. What is wrong with our country????
@TODAYshow Criticized or kissing on lips wtf
@TODAYshow For God's sake. Is there an age where parents are supposed to quit kissing their kids? No, there is not!
@TODAYshow Nope.
@TODAYshow Tom loves his kids @TODAYshow COME ON MAN! This is ridiculous.
@LeaningKeith @TODAYshow No one invited you into the conversation so bye!
@LeaningKeith @TweetedByJeanne @TODAYshow And . . .?
@TODAYshow What is wrong with people today? That is his child, he loves his child. You people need a life.
@LeaningKeith @TODAYshow Ok. And?
@TODAYshow Ew
@TODAYshow Ugh. Yeah.
@TODAYshow This would not be an issue if he wasn’t friendly with Trump.Cut past all the bs...
@TODAYshow I kiss both my son's on the lips, stop the madness! Would it be better if he was slapping him around it hitting him with something? This world we live in is ass backwards ☹🤔☹🤔☹🤔
@TODAYshow That's what lips are for.
@TODAYshow I just unfollowed you for exploiting this beautiful family. #Goodbye
@Craabpot @TODAYshow Yes! 🤠
@TODAYshow Come on people get a life 🙄
@TODAYshow Creepyass #nfl #WTH
@LeaningKeith @TODAYshow So?
@TODAYshow I fucking hope to God my son still wants to kiss me when he’s 11.
@LeaningKeith @TweetedByJeanne @TODAYshow So what are you implying?
@TODAYshow Someone actually showing love should be celebrated, not criticized. ❤️
@TODAYshow Yes, too far! The heck? When they are old enough to be cognizant of what kissing on the lips represents, it's time for the cheeks and forehead to get some action!

@TODAYshow In a world where sexual misconduct is commonplace, teen suicide is at or near epidemic levels, we have an opioid crises and kids are dying at the hands of other kids because of bullying, we are really going to judge a dad who clearly has a solid relationship with his son?

@TODAYshow Posting the freeze frame of the kiss is so sensational...I didn’t see the live video but I’m sure they didn’t linger. A quick kiss and on with life. Seriously, no big deal people. Everyone should kiss their babies often in this crazy world. #mindyourownbeeswax #stopbeingdramatic
@TODAYshow First someone talks about his daughter. Now this. Really? Strange how you don’t go after Hollywood

@TODAYshow Quit 👏 Sexualizing 👏 Children 👏
Fucking idiots...It's ok for a parent to peck their child on the mouth. And I'm from Pittsburgh...Tom Brady is equivalent to Satan here, but I will still defend him on this!!!
@TODAYshow Y’all are as bad as @TMZ
@TODAYshow Brady again?!
@R_R_R_Jr I didn’t

@TODAYshow I kiss my 15yr old son on the lips all the time....quick pecks every time he goes to sleep, wakes up & comes and goes...so why can’t a dad? Love for our children is the greatest of all emotions, why not express it however you feel!
@TODAYshow The only problem i see is that someone took a picture and posted it! Stop posting and you won’t be criticized. Not everything needs to be shared with the world
@TODAYshow Would people STOP!!!! He’s a daddy.
@TODAYshow Nothing wrong with it! Yrs ago men wouldn't show affection to their sons. Kids need to be shown affection by their parents. Leave it alone!
@TODAYshow Who the fuck cares! Leave him alone!
@TODAYshow A father and son who love , MYOB
@TODAYshow Shame on you @TODAYshow. He is 11 and that is his dad, it is affection and love. Don’t make it something different!
@TODAYshow I don't see anything wrong with showing your child love. Move on people.
@TODAYshow People need to get lives.
@TODAYshow Good grief. There is nothing wrong with this. If my dad was still alive I’d still be kissing him on the lips! Thank God the son is learning that affection does not make you less “manly”.
@TODAYshow What is the issue with this?? It's his kid. Stop making it weird.
@TODAYshow Seriously? ! Don't we have other things to worry about?
@TODAYshow Not only is this none of our business , it's just a father/son kiss!! Check your own warped minds people.
@TODAYshow Ummm...eeewww🤢🤮
@TODAYshow 🤦🏽‍♀️ People need to get a LIFE and give more love than they take....ANYWAY 🙄🙄
@TODAYshow I just looked at my 9y old 😂🤣😂🤣 I don’t think I could kiss him on the lips!! I’d kiss those cheeks all day over and over though 😘🤗😘🤗😘🤗😘🤗😘
@TODAYshow Dear lord butt out people.
@TODAYshow The pic just seems odd because it’s caught in still motion making it look bad when we all know damn well it was an innocent quick peck... yes I does LOOK gross, but leave him alone
@TODAYshow This is how loving parents show love to their children. If you are critical, then maybe you were brought up without demonstrative love in your home?
@Drigghostmo1987 @TODAYshow This made me giggle!
@TODAYshow Yuck that looks weird
@TODAYshow Creepy.
@TODAYshow Not that long geesh
@TODAYshow Kinda gross
@TODAYshow Imagine having masculinity so fragile you felt compelled to give a shot about this
@TODAYshow Kiss your kids forever!! It's a love thing.
@TODAYshow Discusting
@TODAYshow With all the money he made my question is why expose his children to public opinion? People is cruel
@TODAYshow Oh please it’s a father and son
@TODAYshow Pure family love.
@TODAYshow Leave this man alone! Everyone should kiss their kids! The world would be a better place!
@TODAYshow Ridiculous! I thought it was so sweet! Everyone’s just jealous! #GoPats
@TODAYshow Ah very creepy!
@TODAYshow Let it be! Billichick was criticized for kissing his adult daughter after the superbowl  several years ago
@TODAYshow  https://t.co/caHs9Su54u
@TODAYshow Leave the Guy alone. Lots of kids kiss their Parents on the lips. Grow up people.
@TODAYshow Oh please... seriously... @today, you are not TMZ, stop acting like it.
@truemira Did you see the video of it?

@TODAYshow As much as I hate Tom Brady... Sometimes my 11 y/o son kisses me on the mouth but most times he doesn't. My 13 y/o will not. It's fine. My dad is 74. I don't kiss him on the mouth. It's fine. Let people be. 

On another note, #FlyEaglesFly #SuperBowl 😊
@TODAYshow ok, more publicity for the Patriots
@R_R_R_Jr I have no idea where it started but that looks like it could have been the culprit.
@TODAYshow This tweet went too far!   A father should should affection!   There is nothing wrong with s kiss from your parent.
@TODAYshow @TODAYshow are you suggesting he slap the shit out of him next time he tries to give his own Dad a kiss? #soconfused
@TweetedByJeanne @TODAYshow Very well said!
@TODAYshow If anyone sexualizes this, they have the problem. It’s his son. You all are perverts and should be ashamed. 🤦🏽‍♂️😣
@TODAYshow #clickbait
@TODAYshow 😳🤮
@TODAYshow you must be proud,  @TODAYshow .
@TODAYshow This is the stupidest thing ever!!! It's his freaking son!!  People need to mind their own business and find a hobby or get a job!!!   #noseybusybody #shitstirrer #godosomething

@TODAYshow The whole arguement lately is that we need to be kind to one another, show our freinds and family we love them. Tom and his family are clearly doing that and are fortunate enough to be able to. Move on people. All the power to them and more.
@TODAYshow Today show going the way of NY Times, USA Today.
@TODAYshow Who cares
@TODAYshow Welcome to being a celebrity! I don't think we care, there are way too many other important issues

@TODAYshow sad how we lost all morals today ever since we allow all to have sex with who they want ,so its ok for grown man to kiss his son on the lips father or not its not right wrong on so many levels looks likes he expoiting his own son
@TODAYshow Not a good pic. No shirt! Yuck! Just werid!
@TODAYshow Society praises these celebs that pose nude post nudes pics but want to criticize a love between a parent and his biological child 🤔🤔🤔
@TODAYshow Not normal

@TODAYshow If you can’t kiss your own children on the lips I hav a problem with the person telling me I can’t!!!  Get your minds out of true gutter and let loving, caring parents love their children!!!  Keep kissing your children Tom!!!
@TODAYshow Let me tell you what news is: Matt Lauer does this to his intern? That’s news. I guess nothing else is happening today so you had to scrape to a new low in journalism.
@TODAYshow It shows they both love each other!! The way it should be!!

@TODAYshow Every family is different. How you were raised is how you do things. Watching 'Tom v. Time', I have a whole new level of respect for the man. He is an incredible athlete & competitor. He is an even greater father, son & husband. All children should have a dad as terrific as Tom.
@TODAYshow The kid kissed Brady
@TODAYshow Ewww. I kiss my 12 year old the lips also but it’s literally a fast peck this one looks like full on mouth to mouth!  I am sure it’s innocent but it doesn’t look right. Go eagles!
@TODAYshow It's his son, what are people criticizing about! He loves his child for Pete's sake!
@TODAYshow It looks so creepy 😖😬
@TODAYshow I kiss my mom, always have. Families show affection in different ways.
@TODAYshow Yes, it's too far!  In America, real fathers give their sons high-powered weapons and flame throwers and teach them to kill baby animals.
@TODAYshow Not a Tom Brady fan by any means, but I think the world could use a lot more of this type of unconditional love and a lot less criticism of it.
@TODAYshow Why not show pictures of Matt Lauer banging an intern in his closed door office ?
@TODAYshow I miss my kids and they husband
@TODAYshow Why dissect every detail?
@TODAYshow Not for kissing him...but for making him kiss him again for a longer period of time. Awkward.

@TODAYshow You know I may not like his team but for real, whoever the hell is complaining about this has got issues. This is just a dad loving his kids. I think it's great seeing a dad love his child. You got a manly man qb dad who is not too tough to love his kid.
@TODAYshow No!No!No!
@TODAYshow People need to get a life!!! A dad kissing his boy, nothing more.... 🙄
@TODAYshow Not a fan of him or his team but seriously?! Leave this alone! He loves his kid! Way more important things to report on!
@TODAYshow OH PLEASE!! What the hell is wrong with you people! It's HIS son! And HIS business! I wish Twitter and Facebook were DEAD! GONE! It only allows us opportunities to show our UGLiness!!
@TODAYshow I still get a kiss from my 17 year old son! Miserable people always need someone to bash...smdh #miserylovescompany

@TODAYshow How sad when others have nothing better to do than to pick apart a family, people they don't even know, for something that doesn't concern them.  Sadder yet that the Today Show, which I watch would share and perpetuate this!
@TODAYshow Oh brother🙄 more important things to worry about
@TODAYshow Is this seriously news!?
@TODAYshow A sign of father/son affection.  Nothing wrong with it.  Beautiful!
@TODAYshow Europeans do that. What's wrong with a hug? Whatever.
@TODAYshow My family are lip smackers. No big deal

@TODAYshow I’m gonna kiss and hug my kids for as long as I can cheek head lips I’ve been doing it since they were borne. I named them and held them and cared for them and I deserve life long kisses for that. Just saying.

@TODAYshow I kiss my sons on their lips every time I leave their presence or put them to bed... you never know if it’ll be the last time you see your loved ones! Leave this man alone for Christ sakes🙄
@TODAYshow No that I loving dad ..dirty minded ppl , my son 25 yrs when ever we see each other he will run to me airport whereava we kiss on the lips!!!
@TODAYshow When Matt Lauer was going around and feeling and touch the females, no one spoke up about it.  What Matt did to females at the job is too far and gross.

@TODAYshow Leave them alone.  Must be a slow day in the news room.  That is his son and I still kiss my dad on his lips and he is 86 years old.  Tom Brady is going to get you all for this.  Messing with his kids is a NO NO.  Shame on the Today Show!
@TODAYshow No, but why is it being filmed?

@TODAYshow Come on seriously...leave the guy alone .. because he's playing in the Superbowl..and he is a good Quarter back..that is his own privacy in his own home.. Don't need to be the public to see

@TODAYshow Well, there is a kiss and then a kiss. What was wrong with the first one?  You could tell his son didn’t want too. How about a secret handshake or fist bump?  I found it uncomfortable and awkward. True, it’s their business, but still awkward.

@TODAYshow Yes, this it too far, but it’s the @TODAYshow that has taken it too far.  You’re promoting a story that isn’t even news!  Do us all a favor and use your platform to report on something important to the world.  #shameonyou
@TODAYshow You should be ashamed to even further this stupid narrative.  Imagine that, a father kissing his kids.
@TODAYshow People have way too much time on your hands. So ridiculous!
@Sam_Shrugged @TODAYshow No big deal
@TODAYshow Omg.  This is so fucking ridiculous.   Seriously.
@TODAYshow This is the point where children need assurance that you love them unconditionally! Don't let them down!  What NONSENSE to wake up one day and ban the affection between them.
@TODAYshow I’m no Tom Brady fan but grown adults should stop sexualing children.  It’s beautiful, healthy, and normal to kiss or hug your kids.  Both my husband and I kiss our kids on the lips.
@TODAYshow People are sick
@SalarRezaei3 @TODAYshow Why, who says were you can and can’t kiss your child, is there a rule!?! Get real!
@TODAYshow I think covering this story will create a bit of bullying on his son's part.
@TODAYshow BS. I’ll do that with my sons, as a form of love, respect. When they leave the house, when go to sleep.  Weird people’s mind. And dirty.
@TODAYshow Criticized by who? Get a life it’s his son!!

@TODAYshow Everyone one needs to leave them alone even though they broadcast their lives. A long lingering kiss is quite strange but that’s not what this is at all.  We teach our 2yr old to be very affectionate & she likes kisses. We want her to be confident & loving.
@TODAYshow Indeed
@TODAYshow Shame on you @TODAYshow for sharing this!! A dad showing affection to his son should not be questioned!!
@TODAYshow No ones business.  That’s his son.  It’s called love.
@TODAYshow Why do people have to sexualize everything?
@TODAYshow I don’t like Tom Brady but that is very sweet. Showing affection to you child is what you are supposed to do as a parent. Not everything is sinister.
@TODAYshow I kiss my son.
@TODAYshow Is this all the "NEWS" you have for today?  #Sad #TodayShow
@TODAYshow I bet he’s so happy he gave his fans this glimpse into his personal life. People have called his daughter names and implied that his affection for his son is inappropriate. So ridiculous.
@TODAYshow There is nothing wrong with a man's son giving him a kiss on the lips.  GROW UP
@TODAYshow Now you see, this misleading photo is why society is feed up with the media, where is the real news
@TODAYshow This is stupid why not,a father has the fight to kiss his own son.

@TODAYshow No...its not too far. He's a child and it's his dad. But when you freeze an image like that its misleading and creats the appearance of something inappropriate. This is a child. You should take that down.

@TODAYshow That is just too much BS, I kissed my father on the lips numerous time when I was young and after I was a grown man, I also kissed him before he died.....he was my father he was the one responsible for me being here today.
@TODAYshow I kiss my son on the lips. He is 15 yrs old. Oh #DoubleStandards  let this man parent his son. I'm sure they will not do this when he is 20! But I will!!!! 💋💋💋
@TODAYshow It's too far that a dad kisses his child? What is up with trying to demonize men/fathers in our soceity? Are only mothers aloud to kiss their children now?
@TODAYshow That's his son! People just need something to make an issue. #Love

@PamNotPamela @TODAYshow No pity party. Just fact’s! I’m 44 and I’m good with it but, damn I would have loved to be that important! People are silly these day’s! I kiss my babies on the lips. I say babies but, they are 27 year old son and 25 year old daughter! I gave them life, Brady gave his son life!

@TODAYshow What? They should shake hands???
Just because there are sick people in the world don’t start grouping in the good people with the sleeze. It becoming a sad sad world when you can’t love you children

@TODAYshow Not a Tom Brady fan but Get Real People. In some families this is totally normal as a show of affection. If we stigmatize affection then we have no measure for acts that are truly abnormal or predatory. Being overly sensitive is as bad as being insensitive.
@TODAYshow If you are famous and put yourself and your family on display expect some negative commentary. #gopats
@TODAYshow Back the fuck off. Geez!
@TODAYshow 1) His son is kissing him and 2)why wouldn't he? and 3) way more important things than this to criticize (TRUMP).
@TODAYshow On the cheeks or forehead or head yes on the lips at that age is a bet too much /:
@TODAYshow This his baby. No malice here.
@TODAYshow It’s up to his son, really. It is possible that in a few years that his son won’t want his dad or mom doing that.

@Pattyjo719 @TODAYshow I am 48 yrs old and my dad has NEVER kissed me on the cheek let alone the lips. No pitty party here either just want people to know some of us would have loved to have their dad kiss them at all
@pimbom @Craabpot @TODAYshow Our Pops kissed us all, sons and daughters, on the lips, so very much NOT a big deal. Leave Brady to do his own thing.
@TODAYshow People need to stop.....
@TODAYshow Oh for God’s she, leave the man alone.
@TODAYshow Ridiculous.
@TODAYshow A lot of people want to kiss Tom on the lips. Including his son.
@TODAYshow What a stupid thing for you to teeet on?  Get real, Today.  This is tabloid crap.  And I am NOT a Tom Brady fan at all.
@TODAYshow There are many reasons that I don't like Tom Brady but him loving his son is not one of them. Get over it
@TODAYshow I'm a notorious Brady basher but really,  don't be stupid,  he seems like an involved and present father screw off haters

@TODAYshow For the love of Pete, Today??? Are you really asking this question. I can’t stand Tom Brady, but to even question is this ‘too far’ is about as asinine as it gets. Get a life!!! Or, find a real story to talk about!!!
@TODAYshow @truemira Is this where that kissing parents on lips thing stemmed from yesterday?
@TODAYshow FFS I hate Tom Brady a little less because of this photo. Good on him for not being ashamed to show his children a fathers love.
@TODAYshow that's weird
@TODAYshow Give me a break
@TODAYshow My mom is 75 & still kisses us on the lips.
@TODAYshow The media is just awful.
@TODAYshow Love for his children being criticized? How dare anybody judge. I kiss my children as much as I can. Kiss your children, maybe you wouldn’t have such a grudge. 🤦‍♂️
@TODAYshow Please report news! It’s a love thing to kiss your children. I’m done with the today show. #fakenews
@TODAYshow Leave this man alone! The hate for Tom Brady and his success is sad.
@TODAYshow Jesus i still kiss my 34 yr old son on the lips..
@TODAYshow This is why Trump is president.. wasted time n resources on stuff like this when th is country needs real journalism ..
@TODAYshow So whaaaaat??? It's not a big deal.......that's his son, his child. Sometimes I wonder😐😐
@TODAYshow Nah! Its fine. Father Son luv at this stage is beautiful.
@TODAYshow I wish my dad loved me enough to even acknowledge me!! Not having a pity party but, this child’s blessed! Not all of us are that lucky! Kiss away 😘
@TODAYshow What’s too far is our criticism of other people’s parenting. Every family and culture is different. No indication of abuse, so we need to stay out of it.
